game.name: Sticky Business
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 편안한 소규모 사업을 운행하며 기쁨을 느껴보세요. 스티커를 만들고, 주문을 포장하고, 손님의 이야기를 들으세요. 인터넷에서 귀여운 가게를 만들 시간입니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience the joy of running your own cozy small business: Create stickers, pack orders and hear your customers’ stories. Time to build the cutest shop on the internet!

reviewHighlights.text: I really love this game! It is so cute and you can get so creative with everything. I definitely will play this game to 100% achievement. It is so rel...
I kinda wish the sharing and rating and buying of stickers with real people was more the backbone of the game - didn't find the story that compelling....
